title: Mediterranean quiche
ingredients: ['100g bacon lardons', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '1 yellow pepper, seeded and diced', '1 green pepper, seeded and diced', '3 spring onions, chopped', '6 eggs', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 sheet shortcrust pastry', '100g grated cheese ( I use mature cheddar)', '1 splash milk (optional)']
